img.alt: Wednesday, April 22, 2020 Virtual Board Meeting Featured Photo

div.div: Due to the Coronavirus- COVID19, the meeting will stream live using WebEx Conferencing. Members of the Public may connect to the live stream video and audio coverage by clicking the meeting link.

img.alt: The Bordentown Bulletin Newsletter Featured Photo

div.div: The March edition of of the Bordentown Bulletin Newsletter is now available.

img.alt: Sodexo Future Chef Completion Winners Featured Photo

div.div:
Congratulations to the winners of the Sodexo Future Chef Competition. Below are the names of the winners.
1st - Pierce Peters 2nd - Avery Taylor 3rd - Leo Silverman 4th - Julianna Kelly 4th - Kelsey Javick

img.alt: Mr. Howard Barman Re-elected as a Board of Education Member Featured Photo

h3.a: Mr. Howard Barman Re-elected as a Board of Education Member

div.div: Congratulations Mr. Barman for being re-elected for another term as a BRSD Board of Education member. Mr. Barman was sworn in at the January 15 meeting. He has been a board member since 2017.

img.alt: 2020 Elected Board of Education Members Featured Photo

div.div: We welcome Ms. Erica Worthy as a newly elected Board of Education member. Also elected for a new term is Mr. Stephen Heberling. Mr. Heberling has been a BRSD School Board member since 2014. Congratulations to them both. We look forward to a great year!!

img.alt: Board of Education 2020 President and Vice President Featured Photo

h3.a: Board of Education 2020 President and Vice President

div.div: Congratulations to Ms. Eileen Francisco-Cabus and Mr. Salvatore Schiano.

The InfoSnap form for the 2019-20 school year is now available. If you child is returning to the Bordentown Regional School district for the 2019-20 please complete the form to verify your information and sign off on all required school agreements. Please note that you will need your snapcode to access the form. Schools will be emailing 2019-20 snapcodes to parents.

div.a: InfoSnap Online Registration for 2019-20 School Year
